children.value: In September of 2019 I took a course called
<a href='https://www.buildingasecondbrain.com'>
Building a Second Brain
by
<a href='https://twitter.com/fortelabs'>
Tiago Forte

Much like it sounds, Building a Second Brain is about creating a reliable system – outside your physical skin-and-bone bodily boundaries – for storing, organising, digesting, and eventually transforming information into Good Creative Output.
Much like any well-integrated tool, the mental distance between you and the system grows small.
It's a lovely little closed feedback loop –
<a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cybernetics">
a cybernetic system
At this point almost all of my daily workflow revolves around my second brain. as, articles, books, papers, podcasts, and half-formed thoughts go in.
These build into notes and develop over time – they merge, meander, and mature into talks and blog posts and illustrations.
It is hard to remember what my workflow looked like without it.
For tools I'm currently using
<a href="https://roamresearch.com/">
Roam Research
, backed up by
<a href="https://www.keyboardmaestro.com/main/">
Keyboard Maestro
for some fancy automation elements.
These illustrated cover all the sections of the course. Enjoy!

<FullWidthImage width="980px" src="https://res.cloudinary.com/dg3gyk0gu/image/upload/c_scale,f_auto,q_100,w_1200/v1586172865/maggieappleton.com/basb/Basb5-2_2x.jpg" alt="Your orderly system of notes is like mise en place – everything in its place" />

<FullWidthImage width="980px" src="https://res.cloudinary.com/dg3gyk0gu/image/upload/c_scale,f_auto,q_100,w_1200/v1586172873/maggieappleton.com/basb/Basb5-4_2x.jpg" alt="We need flexible strategies, not static workflows. We diagnose the problem, form a guiding policy to tackle it, and write an action plan to implement it. " />

<FullWidthImage width="980px" src="https://res.cloudinary.com/dg3gyk0gu/image/upload/c_scale,f_auto,q_100,w_1200/v1586172866/maggieappleton.com/basb/Basb5-3_2x.jpg" alt="Some workflow strategies we can use include context switching, changing the form of our notes, and adding colour commentary through annotations and highlights." />

<FullWidthImage width="980px" src="https://res.cloudinary.com/dg3gyk0gu/image/upload/c_scale,f_auto,q_100,w_1200/v1586172858/maggieappleton.com/basb/Basb6-1_2x.jpg" alt="The final section of BASB covers how to make a personal knowledge management canvas" />

To be clear there's no affiliate as or kickback involved in these notes. 
I'm not being paid to say nice things about the course.
Tiago's ideas and systems are just good.
He thinks everything through in a way that feels rare on the insta-internet.

Hope it gave you a bit of insight into the BASB system.
There's plenty more to explore on Tiago's
<a href="https://praxis.fortelabs.co/">
Forte Labs Blog
and he's
<a href="https://twitter.com/fortelabs">
good at tweeting
